entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:56 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
